name: Octatune
description:
A short game made for the "stop waiting for godot" jam! It has three levels, each a different song (which I spend way too much time getting to work) and each (kinda) unique. This is my first time with the engine, so it is kind of messy. And it is 00:13, so my brain is soup. I hope you enjoy!

Annnd I'll probably write more here when my brain has reset. C-herrs and night!
